"Whoa- you're.. you're right. Wait! Does that mean that I'm not a shadow clone anymore?!" Naruto asked with a worried expression.

"Yep. Now you're a girl through and through. But don't worry, your masculine side has to go somewhere. I'll just leave it in there with you." Naruko explained.

What is Naruto's reaction?
13422211.title: To work as Tsunade's part time assistants

134222111.content:
Naruto sighed in relief as he rubbed the back of his head. "Well, at least I'm free now, but. . ."

Naruko giggled as she hugged her new sister. "Aw don't be so gloomy, you'll enjoy being a girl! I'll show you all the ropes!"

Naruto dropped his head in shame. "That's just what I'm afraid of. . ."

Tsunade sweat-dropped at the sight. "Well then, now that that's taken care of," She then looked at Naruto. "We need to think of a new name for you as Naruto is a boy's name and you are a girl now."

Naruto's reaction?
134222111.title: Releaved that he is free.

134222112.content:
"No freaking way! I'm not gonna stay like this, am I?!" Naruto shouts.

"Yup. You're a girl now, and there's no going back!" Naruko replies nonchalantly.

"Noooooo!!!" Naruto screams.

Tsunade, Shizune, and Naruko all cover their ears as Naruto shrieks.

"Stop it!" Tsunade commands

"Granny, you gotta help me!!" Naruto pleads

"Calm down. Being a girl isn't bad at all." Naruko says

"You shut the hell up!" Naruto yells

Tsunade smacks him on the head and Naruto groans in pain.

"Stop acting like a little baby. This isn't the end of the world you know!" Tsunade shouts

"But granny!" Naruto complains

"No buts! You'll show up tomorrow with Naruko to work and that's final!" Tsunade commands.

She then picks up Naruko and Naruto each with one hand and throws them out her window. The two land ________.
134222112.title: Pissed that he's stuck as Naruko's iden...

choices: Naruko takes Sakura's attack as a challenge, and decides to fight her.
Naruko thinks that Sakura is just jealous of seeing Naruto with another girl.
Naruko thinks that Sakura wants her for herself, and tries to seduce her.
Naruko completely ignores Sakura, and tries to "play" with Naruto a bit more.
14.content:
Naruto simply stood and stared at this girl in terror. The combined amount of all that Chakra he had put into those clones was unimaginable, and she had somehow managed to increase that amount exponentially when she came into existence. He could only assume that something with that much power would be capable of almost anything. Naruto could only imagine how much intelligence this girl had stored in her seductive little hot body

"Naruto!"

Naruko ran toward Naruto and wrapped him in a tackle-hug. Naruto struggled to escape, but this girl's strength was incredible! Her slim feminine arms were easily proving capable of holding him in place. Naruko then loosened her grip on Naruto and held him out in front of her.

"Oh Naruto! It's been so long since you used me! I'm so glad that you gave me the chance to come out again!"

"Hold on a second! Who exactly are you? I Did What!"

"Don't you know, Naruto? I'm you! Well... A girlish, sexier, and apparently more powerful you anyway... You can call me Naruko!"

"WHAT! You've got to be kidding me!"

"What's wrong, Naruto? Are you embarrassed that you couldn't get out of my hug? Don't worry about that, big brother! You're not a wimp, I'm just stronger than you is all!"

"Ugh... Well Naruko, it was nice meeting you... Now I really think that we should get you back inside me where you belong..."

As Naruto placed his hand on Naruko's shoulder, a burst of wind chakra emitted from her shoulder that made both of them jump! The cutting nature of the wind chakra sliced Naruto's hand, leaving a small gash on his palm as he fell to the floor in pain. Before he can even move an inch, his female self was already sitting on top of is chest, seductively licking his wound while softly grinding her knee into his crotch. Naruto was trapped in a strange mixture of discomfort and pleasure. Playfully toying with the original Naruto, Naruko leaned down to the side of his head and whispered seductively into his ear.

“Let’s play some more, big brother!” she said as she playfully bit his ear, nibbling on it lightly before moving her head down and planting a kiss on his neck.

Just as Naruto was beginning to enjoy this experience, Sakura emerges from the shadows and punches Naruko straight in the face. The powerful girl was caught off guard by this attack, and was knocked off of Naruto's chest by the force of the blow. Sakura helps Naruto get to his feet again before turning her attention back to his female double. Naruko was getting back to her feet after brushing off Sakura's chakra-enhanced punch like it was nothing.


What happens next?
14.title: Naruko, the powerful seductress

choices: Punch her till she is out
141.content:
With a smirk, Naruko grabs and throws her to the ground. She then grabbed both her arms and got on Sakura's back. With her attacker subdued, Naruko leans forwards and speaks.

"Well well well... It seems i got a challenger that wasn't a challenge at all. So, what will I do to you now that i got you? Oh, I got an idea! I will..."
141.title: Naruko takes Sakura's attack as a challenge...

1411.content:
Naruko reared her fist back and struck. Thud.

Sakura, unprepared for such retaliation, fell unconscious. Naruto froze. His childhood crush was destroyed by himself, or, at least his female version. Naruko, capitalizing on this, tackled him, making him cry out.
"Now where were we?"
1411.title: Knock Sakura out

14111.content:
In his panic Naruto tried to push his female version off of himself, momentarily forgetting how much monumentally more powerful than he this nude, nubile goddess was.

Naruko giggled at his efforts, his whitening hands splayed out on and pressing against her magnificent breasts.

"Nice try, bro, but you're going to have to put some muscle into your massage; I can hardly feel it!" She leaned her head back and flexed her chest, forcing Naturo's fingers apart.

Humiliated and furious, the boy ninja reared back and launched a right-handed punch at one of the rock-firm hemispheres, only for his target's left arm to blur with speed as she caught his fist.

"Now, now, brother, play nice!" she chided him gently.

Then she began to squeeze.

Naruto's eyes bulged as he yanked desperately at his trapped limb, but the feminine fist imprisoning it was far too strong for him.

Jagged bolts of pure pain shot down his right arm as his finger bones began to fracture and then break in Naruko's crushing, iron grasp; the gorgeous, mighty Amazon didn't even seem to be putting any EFFORT into it!

"Stop! Please stop!" he begged as tears streamed down his cheeks.

Releasing his mangled hand at last, Naruko rose majestically to her feet, blotting out the sun and towering over her brother in an intimidating, dominant power pose!

"Are you ready to be a good boy now?" the apex alpha female asked sternly.
14111.title: Push her off

choices: Looks like Naruto is on the menu
She goes to the village to look for some more tasty kunoichi
1412.content:
"Oh, I got an idea! I think I'll gobble you up!"

Sakura and Naruto were taken aback by her statement.

"What?" Naruto said.

Naruko quickly licked Sakura's cheek, getting a taste of the meal to come.

"Mmm, yummy."

"Get off of her!" Naruto yelled, charging at his feminine doppelganger, kunai in hand.

Naruko quickly got into a hand sign position.

"Shadow Clone Jutsu!"

A clone of Naruko appeared in a puff of spoke and immediately retaliated against the advancing Naruto. He tried to stab her with the Kunai, but the clone swiftly dodged it and knocked him to the ground. She then climbed on top of him, restraining his arms and effectively pinning him.

During the commotion, Sakura took the opportunity to turn around and deliver a back-handed punch to her would-be predator. The punch connected, momentarily startling Naruko, but she soon regained control and pinned Sakura down again, the kunoichi now facing her.

"Now that was naughty of you two," Naruko said. "You shouldn't interrupt someone while they're eating, especially a lady like me."

"Naruko! Stop this!" cried Naruto. "If you really are like me, then you should know that this is wrong!"

Naruko chuckled.

"It's true that I come from you, Naruto. But I come from a darker side of you. I have certain needs that I'm more willing to act on. I have great desires, great lust, and great hunger. And right now, I'm very hungry."

She looked over to Sakura, eying her soon-to-be-meal and licked her lips. She looked back over and addressed her clone.

"Now, Shadow Clone, be a dear and keep him occupied while I partake of this delicious young girl."

The clone complied and gave Naruto a deep kiss as he struggled against his captor.

Naruko then gave her full attention to Sakura.

"Now dear, I believe it's time for me to eat you up."

"And how do you propose to do that?" Sakura asked, bitterly.

"Oh, I'm so glad you asked," said Naruko. "You see, unlike my dimwitted brother over there, I've amassed quite a number of jutsu and I have one right now that will just do the trick. It's a jutsu that will allow me to swallow you whole. And the best part of it is that, once you're in my belly, not only your body, but all of your chakra and jutsus will belong to me."

Sakura's eyes went wide, horrified at the prospect of such a jutsu, as well as her own fate.

"I can see you're dying to see it," said Naruko. "Well, let me keep you waiting no longer." She took a deep breath and then cried out. "CONSUMPTION JUTSU!!!"

Chakra rushed through Naruko's entire body as the jutsu began to take effect. Slowly, she began to open her mouth, slowly moving towards the terrified Sakura.

"N-no... stop!" Sakura cried.

Naruko continued to advance, her mouth expanding even more, like a snake unhinging its jaw. Her cavernous maw was all that Sakura could see; the back of her throat a pitch black pit that led to her waiting stomach. Soon, the blond-haired beauty struck and engulfed Sakura's entire head. Taking a moment to savor the taste of her tender flesh, Naruko then took a big gulp, forcing Sakura's head into her throat. Naruko then began to feed the rest of the girl's body into her mouth. She held Sakura's arms to her side as she dismounted the girl's torso and continued to force the girl into her digestive tract. Gulp by gulp, swallow by swallow, Sakura's shoulders, chest, waist, and hips were all fed into the gullet of the greedy predator. Naruko's belly soon began to distend as the unfortunate kunoichi began to enter her stomach.

Amidst the consumption of his friend, Naruto was still being detained by Naruko's shadow clone. She had since stopped kissing him and was now smothering the boy in her ample cleavage. Naruto struggled, still helpless to do anything as his teammate was devoured.

Naruko was in the final stretch of her meal, only needing to swallow her prey's legs. She took a few more gulps, the legs easily sliding into her maw, and soon only the feet remained. Naruko closed her mouth over the girl's feet and gave one last swallow. With that, Sakura had entirely entered her belly. The once proud kunoichi was now nothing more than a meal in the bloated gut of the female predator.

The now much larger Naruko basked in the afterglow of her meal. Her stomach was now greatly distended, looking like she was at a full-term pregnancy. She patted and rubbed her massive abdomen as it emitted the occasional groan and burbling sound.

"Ah, she was delicious," remarked Naruko. She felt the kunoichi's chakra dissipating and adding to her already exorbitant amount. "Hmm, let's say we try using Chakra Enhanced Strength?" She bolted over to a nearby tree and, using the ability she had gained from the girl residing in her stomach, obliterated the tree trunk, toppling the entire tree, using only her fist. "Ah, excellent."

She turned her attention to Naruto, who was still being smothered by her clone. "All right, that's enough." She quickly released the clone, and it disappeared in a puff of smoke. Naruto soon realized he was free and immediately noticed his female counterpart and her greatly expanded gut.

"You....what have you done with Sakura?!" he cried.

"I already told you, didn't I?" she answered. "I ate her all up." She stroked her stomach, a small gurgle emitting from it. "She's right here in my belly."

"You...you couldn't have."

"Oh, but I did. And a tasty thing she was too." She then felt a lump coming up her throat.

She momentarily twitched and then let out a large belch. In addition to the gas that was expelled from her stomach, she also burped up Sakura's headband, which promptly landed on the ground.

"Oh my, excuse me," said Naruko.

She looked down and noticed the headband, soaked in saliva and digestive fluid.

"Well, I suppose she won't be needing that. Metal is bad for the digestive process anyway. Just my good fortune," she chuckled.

The rage was building in Naruto, as Naruko mocked the girl he so cared about and whom she had devoured so greedily. "Damn you.....SPIT HER OUT! NOW!!" He yelled.

"Oh, now why should I do that?" she asked. "After all, I ate her up, fair and square. Aside from that, she feels so good in my belly. In fact, I think I may need to go for seconds."

She eyed Naruto deviously.
1412.title: Vore Her

14121.content:
She eyed Naruto deviously.

"You know, I gotta admit brother, you look mighty tasty," Naruko said licking her lips. "Tell ya what, Naruto, I'll make you a deal. You just let me eat you up and then you can be with Sakura." She grabbed her belly with both hands and jiggled the sphere a bit. "Come on. There's plenty of room for you."

Naruto became a bit nervous at her threat, but he soon regained his confidence and gave a cocky grin.

"LIKE HELL THAT'LL HAPPEN!" he declared. "Just try and eat me! I'll beat you and force Sakura out of your stomach!"

Naruko giggled. "I should've known you'd want to do it the hard way, dear brother. Well, if that's what you want..." she then took a deep breath of air and "sucked in" her stomach, making it flat. "...by all means, come at me."

"Ah! Sakura!" Naruto yelled, reacting to Naruko's flattened stomach. "What did you..."

"Oh relax, Naruto. It's just a little Compression jutsu. Sakura is still safe and snug, digesting in my belly." She rubbed her belly and let out a slight burp for emphasis.

"Damn you," he muttered. He quickly made a hand sign. "SHADOW CLONE JUTSU!!!"

Suddenly, not a just a few, but dozens of clones appeared, surrounding Naruko, all prepared to attack.

"Oh? Is that it?" Naruko remarked, disappointed. "I was hoping for something a little more challenging."

All the Naruto's, paying no heed to her dismissive statement, swarmed Naruko all at once. Unfortunately, their attack was short-lived and totally ineffectual. Before any of them could reach her, Naruko put up a hand sign and disappeared instantly. Suddenly, the clones rapidly started to disappear, one-by-one. They dissipated into puffs of smoke, each making a popping noise as they vanished; like miniature fireworks. This was because Naruko had activated the Lightning Step technique, which allowed her to move at what seemed like the speed of light, as well as the Chakra Enhanced Strength technique. Moving at a speed so fast that not even the human eye could register it, she maneuvered her way around all the Naruto's, delivering one swift punch to each, completely obliterating them. In fact, the attack occurred so fast, that most of the clones hadn't even realized what happened.

In a matter of seconds, it was all over.

All the shadow clones had been destroyed, and Naruto stood alone, utterly flabbergasted at what he had witnessed. Before he could react, Naruko instantly appeared, right in front of him.

"Oops. I missed one," she said cheekily.

She then delivered a final brutal punch to Naruto's abdomen. A world of pain rushed over him. The wind knocked out of him and a burning pain so severe that it effectively left him incapacitated. He lied on the ground, trembling.

"Oh, no wait, that's just you. How silly of me," Naruko said, taunting her injured "brother." "Well, I'd say that pretty well settles it, dear brother. Though I am a bit disappointed you couldn't put up more of a fight. I guess I didn't realize how much stronger than you I was." She thought for a moment and then observed her own arm, clenching her fist. "Of course, Sakura's Chakra Strength really did help quite a bit. Not that I really needed it, of course." She then leaned down and picked up the helpless Naruto by his neck, using only her right hand. "I think we both knew this had to happen eventually," she said. "After all, there can only be one of us. And since I'm the stronger one, it makes sense that I should be the one to stay. It's only natural for the strong to live on, while the weak are devoured."

Naruto could only dangle from her arm, limp as a rag doll. It was all he could do to stay focused enough to keep his eyes open and on her and let out the occasional grunt.

"Oh, but don't worry, Naruto, you won't die. I could never kill my own brother. I'm just going to absorb you back into my consciousness. You know, like how I was a part of your consciousness until now? Well, let's just think of it as reversing roles."

Her words did little to reassure him.

"But before that, I'll be happy to send you down into my belly where you can say your goodbyes to Sakura. You did have a crush on her, right? Oh, what am I saying? Of course you did! I should know, after all. Well, now you two can be together forever as part of my body. 'Fraid it won't work out for you too well in the traditional physical sense. But hey, maybe you can get her to make out with you before you're both digested!"

That last comment gave the Naruto the motivation to conjure one last rage-filled punch that connected with Naruko's face. She was hurt, but still composed. She glared angrily at her defiant "brother."

"Well, if you want to have it that way, you're not going to see Sakura at all." She pulled him closer to her. "Instead of absorbing you slowly through my stomach, I'm just going to absorb you directly into my body."

She paused for a moment, glaring and scowling at Naruto, but her scowl slowly turned into a malicious smile. Suddenly, she yanked Naruto's head forward, smothering his face in her ample cleavage.

"Mmm, don't you just love this luscious body, Naruto? The body that you'll soon become a part of?" Naruto moaned and grunted loudly as his face was kneaded into her breasts. "Of course, it's going to become even more luscious and even more powerful soon. Just think of all the tasty kunoichi out there, just ripe for the picking."

At that point, Naruto noticed that he wasn't just being pressed against Naruto's breasts, but was beginning to sink into them. Using what little strength he had, he struggled and tried to pull away, but his efforts were fruitless.

"Not only will they add to my beauty..." Naruko continued, "...but to my abilities as well."

Naruto's arms and torso began to sink in as well.

"Soon, I'll be the strongest kunoichi in the world."

Naruto's entire body was phasing into Naruko's own. Indeed, he was truly being absorbed.

"Maybe the only kunoichi," she laughed.

Naruto began to lose consciousness as over half his been had been overtaken by Naruko.

"And this is the body that you'll have the distinct privilege to be a part of, my dearest brother."

Only Naruto's back, hands and feet remained visible to the outside world.

"Dattebayo," she finished.

With that, Naruto was totally sucked into her body. His physical body dissipated into nothing within her, his chakra reserves were added to her own, and his mind was forced into a dark corner of her subconscious where he would be no threat.

Naruko felt a great surge of power within her, having become "complete" again. She felt twice as strong as she did before.

"Ooh, what a rush," she remarked. "Thanks for the power boost, Naruto. I have to admit, I will miss your goofy and perverted nature. But, as they say, out with the old, in with the new."

She looked at the world around her, basking her newfound freedom.

"So, what should I do first? Maybe I could go to Konoha and try to take it over after dining on some of the local cuisine."

"Cuisine" of course, meaning kunoichi.

"Or maybe I could go out into the world. Find some strong ninja to devour and sample some exotic flavors."

She thought for a moment, and decided to...
14121.title: Looks like Naruto is on the menu

choices: Go for the weaker ninja first
141211.content:
She thought for a moment and decided to go to Konoha.

"I suppose it'd be good to start with a place I'm familiar with," said Naruko. "Naruto always did want to be Hokage, after all. What he struggled to become his whole life, I'll bet I could become in a day."

Naruko became giddy, thinking of all the potential things she could do.

"Oh, and just think of all the tasty girls in there, just waiting for me. Ino, Hinata, Tenten, Anko, and of course the big fish, Tsunade."

She laughed manically, unable to contain her excitement. After calming down a bit, she remarked, "But how shall I go about it? I could go after Tsunade right off the bat, dethrone her, and then assume the Hokage position myself. With this power boost, I'll bet I could do it."

She contemplated some more, giving her first idea a second thought.

"Or maybe I should play it safe and pick off some of the weaker ninja first. Once I've got their chakra and abilities, I'll definitely be able to take on Tsunade. Hmm, what to do?"
141211.title: Go to Konoha

1412111.content:
"Hmm, what to do?" Naruko thought.

Perhaps it was the naturally impulsive nature of Naruto, and, therefore, of Naruko, that caused her to feel quite daring. In any case, she decided to go straight for the Hokage.

"Ooh, I can't possibly wait!" said Naruko. "Not only will I have control over Konoha once she's gone, but she's the plumpest, most delicious meal in the whole village! All of her abilities, all of her chakra, and all of her juicy succulent body will be mine!"

She imagined Tsunade as a huge suckling pig; naked, roasted, and served on a silver platter, just waiting to be eaten. The very thought caused Naruko's stomach to roar with hunger and jut back out to its former bloated self. She looked down, smiling warmly, and rubbed her belly to try to appease it.

"Easy, girl, easy. She'll be ours soon enough." Her stomach settled down, but still let out an occasional gurgle. The gravid size of her middle reminded her of Sakura, the unfortunate kunoichi that still resided within it.

"Well, Sakura, it looks like you'll soon be reunited with your precious sensei. I do love happy reunions... Well, it'll be happy for me anyway."

Suddenly, Naruko was struck with an idea. She gave a devilish smile.

"Hmm, and, in a way, you're going to help me reunite the two of you," she said to the girl in her belly.

---

Tsunade sat in her office, swamped with work. All manner of administrative work lay before her: new legislation, budget plans, mission requests, petitions, judicial orders, and, of course, above all else, there was the matter of the Hokage Summit, which was set to take place in a matter of days.

"*sigh* Give me a life-threatening battle any day over this," she mused to herself.

As if on cue, there was a knock at her door.

"Come in," Tsunade said sluggishly.

The door slowly opened and before Tsunade was, who appeared to be, her faithful and only student, Sakura.

"Good afternoon, Tsunade-sensei," she said cheerily.

Of course, the girl standing before Tsunade could not very well be Sakura, as she was a bit preoccupied getting better acquainted with a certain someone's gastrointestinal system. The girl standing before Tsunade was, in fact, Naruko, the certain someone whose gastrointestinal system Sakura was getting better acquainted with.

"Oh, hello Sakura," Tsunade said, mustering as much enthusiasm as she could. "Did you find Naruto?"

"Oh, sure did, Tsunade-sensei," she replied. "He was doing some training outside the village, but I sent him back home where he belongs." Naruko internally laughed at her own inside joke.

"Hmm, good. We can't have him recklessly running around outside the village like that. We recently received reports that Akatsuki may be on the move again."

For the moment, The Akatsuki was not a group that Naruko was particularly interested in. Perhaps they would be worth looking into down the line to see if there was any advantage (and delicious kunoichi) that could be gained from them. But for now, they did not interest her. So, instead, she shifted the subject to something that did interest.

"Tsunade-sensei, I didn't see Shizune in the office today. Do you know where she is?" Naruko asked.

"Didn't I tell you? Today is Shizune's day off," replied Tsunade. She observed the stacks of paper around her. "And a splendid day for her to do it too."

It was too perfect. Not only was Naruko staring straight across from the prey that she so deeply desired, that would allow her total control of the village, and that was totally unsuspecting of her, but there would be no one to hear or interfere should things turn a bit dicey. There she stood, smack dab in the lion's den. The only question that remained was, who was the lion?

Naruko made her move.

"Well, Tsunade-sensei, I'm so sorry that you've been burdened with all this work." she said, in her kindest, most innocent voice possible. "Is there anything at all that your faithful student can do to help?"

Alas, there was very little that a Chunin, such as Sakura, could do to aid in the administrative matters assigned to the Hokage. But Tsunade decided to humor her.

"I'm afraid there isn't much you can do, Sakura. But, if you could, could you hand me that stack of papers over there?" she said, pointing to a nearby shelf.

"Absolutely, dear sensei," Naruko replied.

Naruko walked meticulously to the stack of papers. This was it; the moment to strike. What came after this would all depend on how quick, powerful, subtle, and lucky Naruko was. She grabbed the stack of papers off the shelf, holding them at chest level. As she brought them to the Hokage's desk, she delicately and silently performed a hand sign with one hand that was covered by the stack of papers, which were being held by the other. She finished the hand sign just in time as she made it to the desk, placing the papers down.

"Here you are, Tsunade-sensei."

"Thank you, Sakura."

Naruko sprung her trap. In an instant, she launched her arm straight at Tsunade. Her hand had become imbued with the power of the Paralysis jutsu. If the attack connected, Tsunade would become completely paralyzed, head to toe, making her easy prey for the ravenous Naruko. The attack rocketed straight towards Tsunade, and....
1412111.title: Go straight for the Hokage

14121111.content:
The attack rocketed straight towards Tsunade and made contact, jabbing her straight in the neck. Before Tsunade even knew what hit her, the jutsu had taken effect, paralyzing her entire body. She fell to the floor, motionless, but still conscious, trying to make sense of what had just happened. Naruko looked down on the fallen Hokage.

"Wow. I can't believe it was that simple."

She walked closer to Tsunade so that she could be face-to-face with her.

"I mean, I know I'm super strong and all, but really. I guess you weren't as great a Hokage as I, or anyone else, thought."

She stopped as she stood right in the middle of Tsunade's view. From the evidence shown in front of her, Tsunade could tell that this was definitely not her apprentice standing in front and whoever it was who was masquerading as Sakura was certainly responsible for the attack on her and the subsequent paralysis. Had she not been so overwhelmed and distracted with paperwork, she might have noticed it sooner. Focusing as hard as she could, Tsunade summoned her chakra and expelled it in a great show of force, breaking the paralysis jutsu around her head and allowing her to speak.

"You... Wh... WHO THE HELL ARE YOU?!" Tsunade yelled, gasping for air.

Naruko was quite taken aback by the Hokage's impressive feat.

"Well well, that's quite a surprise. Looks like you were able to break through my jutsu. Well, partially anyway. Still, not too shabby. Guess I spoke too soon about you not being that great of a Hokage." Naruko gave a devilish and confident smile. "Well, not that it matters since you're still helpless to do anything. Oh, but listen to me ramble on," she said condescendingly. "I haven't even answered your question yet. Well, as you've so perceptively noticed, I am not your 'faithful student' Sakura, though I assure you, she is close by. As for who I am? Well... I guess I'll just show you."

Instead of the usual Transformation jutsu release, which would be expected in most cases and result in a puff of smoke, Naruko's body simply shifted instantaneously, morphing her entire body, clothes and all, into her true self.

"N...Naruto?" Tsunade said, confounded by the sight before her.

"Mmm, not quite, dear Tsunade. Long story, but I'm a part of Naruto's consciousness that has come to life. His "feminine side" if you will. A result of the training my dear brother was doing in the forest. You can call me Naruko."

"You... Wh-where are Naruto and Sakura...?" Tsunade muttered.

Naruko chuckled. "Oh, I absorbed Naruto into my consciousness. Right where he belongs. I'd say it's time for the feminine side to run things for a change. And as for Sakura, well..."

With that, Naruko slowly expanded her stomach. The bloated size of the sphere indicating Sakura's presence within it. Naruko let out a sigh, placing both hands on her stomach.

"I told you she was close by," Naruko said cheekily.

Tsunade was completely incredulous to what she was seeing. All the signs seemed to indicate it, but she didn't want to believe it. She couldn't believe that this girl had used "that" jutsu.

"N... No... what did you...?"

"What else, dear Tsunade?" Naruko interjected. "I ate her up, of course. And I have to say, Tsunade, you raised one tasty and agreeable apprentice. She's digesting quite nicely in there." She promptly patted her huge belly. "And that morphing side effect is really quite convenient. Don't have to worry about using up my chakra with a Transformation jutsu. I can just transform into whoever I eat indefinitely."

Tsunade was horrified.

"No... you used the Consumption jutsu!" she yelled. "But how? That technique is forbidden!"

"Hmm, good question," Naruko replied, as she drummed her fingers on her engorged stomach. "You see, back when Naruto stole that forbidden scroll from the ninja records, the one that he used to learn the Shadow Clone technique, he learned a bit more than just how to make Shadow Clones. Not consciously anyway, but as he looked through the scroll, he also saw the instructions for the Consumption technique. Be it just for a moment or through his peripheral vision, he still observed those instructions and they were forever sealed into his subconscious; the same place I resided for all those years. So, once I shifted from subconscious to fully conscious, using the jutsu was like second nature to me. And I'm so glad too. You have no idea how tasty supple young kunoichi are," she said looking down at her belly. "Oh, and there were several other forbidden jutsu that were sealed into Naruto's subconscious that are now at my disposal."

Tsunade finally understood the true nature of this threat. Even if she wasn't paralyzed and was at full power, she, quite frankly, wasn't sure if she could still defeat her. She did the only thing she could do: press her for more information and stall for time.

"What do you want...?" she asked weakly.

"What do I want?" Naruko said playfully. "Why, I want you, of course, my dear Tsunade." She knelt down, staring Tsunade straight in the face. "I want to eat you. I want to taste your sweet, soft, tender, succulent, meaty, fatty, delicious body. I want you in my belly, right next to your delicious student. I want to digest your body, absorb all of its nutrients, and make my sexy body even sexier. I want to absorb all of your chakra. I want to absorb all of your abilities and use them for myself. And, of course, I want your position as Hokage. And once you're safely packed away in my belly, I'll have the perfect disguise of you, and I'll take over Konoha."

Tsunade, sticking to her plan, pressed Naruko further.

"Wh...why?"

"Why?" Naruko responded. "Because I want so much more than just you, Tsunade. I want this entire village. No, I want the world! Once I'm Hokage, every girl in this village will be at my mercy. All I have to do is give the word and they'll be brought to me on a silver platter. I'll devour them all, becoming stronger and sexier with each one I send to my belly. And when that's done, I'll find even more kunoichi to devour. The entire world will be my buffet! I'll sample girls from all the villages from every country in the world! All of them will meet their end in my hungry belly! With all of their strength, chakra, and abilities added to my own, nothing will stand in my way!"

Naruko had certainly made it easy for Tsunade to stall for time. Still, the paralysis was deathly powerful and Tsunade still hadn't accumulated enough chakra to break through it. She needed more time.

"You...you think you can do that?" Tsunade scoffed. "You think you can just walk around eating Konoha citizens? No matter what your plan is, you won't be able to fool them forever. They'll find out what's going on. They'll find out who you are. And when they do, they'll destroy you."

Acknowledging the slight lapse in her plan, Naruko replied compromisingly, but confidently. "Hmm, true. I'm sure they'll find out sooner or later. But by the time they do, I'll have become so powerful that they'll have no choice but to submit to me!" As she finished, a small gurgled sounded from her stomach.

Tsunade tried to stall further. "But how..."

"SHUSH!" Naruko interjected. "No more of that. This has been fun, but my tummy says it's time to eat. And I believe right now it's hungry for a nice plump Hokage." She stared intently at the fallen Tsunade, her eyes filled with malice and hunger, as she rubbed her bloated midsection. She licked her lips, preparing for the coming meal. "Now, dear Tsunade, time to fulfill your last and greatest role as Hokage by becoming my meal. Be sure to say 'hi' to Sakura for me."

This was it. There was no way for Tsunade to stall any longer. As Naruko reached down to grab her, she knew she had to act then or never. Unfortunately, she wasn't sure if the chakra she'd accumulated would be enough to break the paralysis. But she was left with no choice. She gathered all her remaining chakra for one final burst. The chakra sprang forth in a giant jolt that coursed through Tsunade's body, and...
14121111.title: The attack connects

choices: There's a knock on the door
141211112.content:
Alas, the surge of chakra was not enough to break the paralysis jutsu. Tsunade's heart sunk as she realized her failure. She looked up as Naruko approached, her fate becoming certain: that soon she was going to be nothing more than a meal for this glutton of a girl. More than concern for herself, she felt dismay at having let down her village and fear for what Naruko would do to her people.

Naruko grabbed Tsunade's shirt collar and pulled her body up. The Hokage stood, or rather limped, upright, staring at her predator eye-to-eye. Naruko looked over Tsunade, head-to-toe, sizing up her meal.

"You are going to be delicious," she said.

She grabbed one of Tsunade's breasts with her free hand, giving it a good squeeze.

"And filling too," she added.

And with that, Naruko commenced with her unabashed cannibalism.

"Consumption Jutsu."

Naruko's jaw opened impossibly wide. She slowly and meticulously moved her maw over the Hokage's head. Tsunade, unflinchingly and resolutely, stared into the dark pit, prepared to embrace her fate. Naruko's mouth covered Tsunade's face and soon her entire head was gulped down.

Naruko shifted her grip on the Hokage, holding her by her arms. She swallowed her down further, feeding her into her waiting stomach, until she got to Hokage's massive breasts. So buxom was Tsunade, that Naruko began to experience trouble swallowing her overabundant chest.

After a bit of shifting and squeezing though, Naruko managed to fit Tsunade's impressive bust into her mouth and swallowed it down as well. From there, it was smooth-sailing for the hungry predator. Tsunade's hips, waist, thighs, and shins were all sent down Naruko's gullet, as her stomach expanded greatly to accommodate its new arrival.

Naruko made one final gulp to send down Tsunade's feet, and it was all over. The once-great Hokage had become nothing more than food and the greatly-increased waistline of a cannibalistic girl.

Naruko's stomach, to put it bluntly, was huge. The massive dome, a testament to her gluttony and unquenchable appetite, was now, in fact, larger than she was. Even using both her arms to carry her tremendous girth, the mass was so heavy that she could barely stand.

"Ooh....*BURP!* .....Oh, I'm so bloated," she said.

Realizing she would definitely have lie down, she waddled over to Tsunade's desk and cleared it of the mountains of paperwork. She turned around and threw her back onto the now-clear desk. Her stomach became a bulky mountain, its apex ascending and descending with each breath that Naruko took.

The stomach groaned and churned as it began digesting the woman within. Naruko could feel the Hokage's chakra being siphoned, adding to her own, as she rubbed the distended sphere.

"Well, I hope you're comfy in there, Tsunade. Because, to be honest, I think you really did a number on me. Oh, but it was worth it...*ulp*...*belch*. You were absolutely delicious, and I've never been so full in my life. Granted I've only been alive for a few hours, but who's counting?" She chuckled as she patted her bulbous belly. "How sad that the Hokage should meet such a degrading end as nothing more than a meal for a cute little girl like me. But don't worry Tsunade, I'll be a better Hokage than you ever were. And I'll take good care of your precious villagers. I'll make sure all the girls, in particular, are very well-fed." Her mind drifted to all the potential meals she would have. "Yes, when I'm done with them, they'll be nice and plump and...tender."

Her belly continued to bubble and gurgle. In a little over an hour, the Hokage would be gone for good.

"Well, for now, let's just focus on digesting you," she said. "Hmm, you better not give me any indigestion."

With that, Naruko shut her eyes, ready to take a little after-meal nap, as her stomach set to work on absorbing Tsunade's body.

1412111121.content:
Naruko stared down at the remains of Sakura and Tsunade as they swirled around the porcelain bowl and disappeared into the sewer system. As powerful as her digestive tract might be, even with the jutsu enhancing it, there were just some things that Naruko's body couldn't properly absorb. Nothing that a good flush down a toilet couldn't fix. And to think it had only taken her a little over a half hour longer to fully digest her meals then it should have. Seemed she may have overestimated the strength of her digestive system.

Stepping out of the stall and moving towards the sink, Naruko thought on what she wanted to do now that the village was essentially in her control. Hokage Tsunade may have been but, she didn't have the power that being Hokage had come with during the time her father, Minato Namikaze had been in office. That was due to those greedy pigs on the council. This brought Naruko to the first problem. She didn't like the idea of running the village from behind another person’s face. She could tolerate the idea of using a Shadow Clone to take Tsunade's place for now, as that would allow her to go about her marry way and eat a few more tasty kunoichi. Still she needed to find some way of dealing with the councils, both the civilian and the ninja ones.

'I could always just eat them...' Naruko discarded that idea almost immediately. The only ones she wanted in her belly were tasty girls and most of the council was comprised of men. The thought of trying to gather support through Hinata and Ino came to mind but, she tossed that idea out as well. Ino still didn't take her ninja career seriously enough, so Naruko doubted that her father would concede to any request that could possibly endanger the villages’ security. Besides, that blond was just too scrumptious looking to not eat.

Hinata, as strong as she was and as hard as she worked, Naruko truly believed that unless something major happened Hinata wouldn't be clan head of the Hyuga. Besides, Naruko had an idea that she was toying with that involved the 'meaty' Hyuga. If it worked out then Naruko would have herself a little company as she devoured the villages’ female population. Having come from a boy’s subconscious it only made sense that she found other females attractive and being at the top of the food chain would get rather lonely after awhile.

Shrugging her shoulders, Naruko decided that she'd think on the issue of how to get herself in office properly later. For now, she was felt like getting a snack. 'Wonder if there are any tasty girls brother knew nearby?' With a quick motion, Naruko summoned a Shadow Clone and had it shift into Tsunade's appearance before sending it off back to the office. The clone had a mess of paperwork to do after all.

Before making her way out of the Hokage Tower, Naruko debated on taking Naruto's appearance. It would keep people from noticing his absence, not that very many would really care outside of a certain Hyuga girl that Naruko planned to have some fun with. Still, it also made sense to reveal herself now so that the village could adapt to her presence.

Which does she do?

14122.content:
She eyed Naruto deviously.

"Say Naruto, who do you think would taste best? Ino, Hinata, or Tenten?"

His eyes went wide at the ominous statement.

"I'll bet it's Hinata," Naruko said teasingly. "She has those plump breasts after all. Definitely a good amount of meat on her. Though a girl like me does need to watch her weight. I'm sure Ino would be nice and lean. And I could do her the kindness of being reunited with Sakura one last time." She patted her gut.

Naruto could no longer contain the rage building inside him.

"YOU'RE NOT GOING TO EAT ANYONE!!!"

The Kyuubi Chakra within Naruto burst forth, enveloping him in a raging red aura. He held his arm out and manifested a Rasengan.

"I'M GOING TO STOP YOU AND GET SAKURA OUT OF YOUR BLOATED STOMACH RIGHT NOW!!!"

"Aw, I'm not that bloated. Am I?" Naruko said quizzically, looking down at her massive belly.

Naruto charged at his female clone, ready to strike.

"All right, that's enough." Naruko said.

She readied a hand sign.

"Paralysis Jutsu!" she yelled.

Suddenly, Naruto completely froze up. The Rasengan and the Kyuubi chakra around him dissipated. He fell to the ground motionless and unable to talk, but still conscious. Naruko walked up to him and looked down condescendingly.

"Tsk, tsk. Why must you continue to be such a naughty boy, Naruto?"

She reached down and picked him up by his chin. She held him at eye level.

"So you want to get Sakura out of my belly, do you?" She chuckled. "Well, I'm afraid I can't let that happen, but if you want to I can let you say goodbye to her."

She grabbed his face with both hands and pressed the side of his head to her humongous gut.

"You see, right now my stomach is siphoning all of her delicious chakra. After her chakra's been drained, she'll be quite weak; barely alive. But she'll be just alive enough to experience me digesting her body. All together, I'd say it'll be about an hour before she's gone. And wouldn't you know it, that's just about how long the paralysis jutsu I put on you lasts."

She held him back up to face her. He glared at her furiously.

"Oh, don't be so bitter, dear brother." She place his head back on her belly. "Your friend will always exist as part of me. Can't you feel it? She's becoming a part of something great. And soon even more of your friends will be inside my wonderful belly."

She raised him off her belly and carried his body over to a nearby tree, leaning his immobile body up against it.

"You were right about one thing though, brother. I do look a bit bloated," she said patting her belly.

She took a huge gasp of air and 'sucked in' her gut. The once globular abdomen returned to its previous totally flat state.

"Ah, much better."

She looked back over to her 'brother.'

"Now Naruto, I can see you're upset about this, but let's give you a little while to cool down and then we'll talk about it. I'm sure I can convince you to see things my way. In the meantime, I'm going to go get a bite to eat."

She proceeded to walk away from him.

"Don't worry, I promise I won't eat more than two. As I said, a girl like me has to watch her figure."

She looked down, observing her quite feminine body.

"Hmm, come to think of it, I should really do something to blend in."

She made a hand sign and puff of smoke appeared around her. Once the smoke cleared she was revealed to look just like Naruto.

"Ah, perfect!" she declared. "With this disguise I'll be able to get the drop on those tasty morsels easily. After all, who would suspect that their beloved Naruto would try to swallow them up?" she said eyeing Naruto. "See ya later, bro."

And with that she disappeared, making her way to the village.

Naruto sat there with his own internal frustration. He tried to think of anything he could do to break free, but it was useless. His far superior powerful female copy had completely trapped him and now she was free to prey on his friends.

---

Before long, Naruko had entered the Hidden Leaf village. To her, it appeared as little more than a buffet. So many girls of all shapes and sizes to take her pick of. But she knew there were only three she was really interested in.

She decided to take a leisurely stroll down the street at her own pace. 'No sense in rushing it,' she thought. She walked down the village's busy thoroughfares, not a single citizen the wiser that she wasn't quite who she appeared to be.

She eventually made her way to a more isolated area of the village, where there was almost no one to be seen. She turned a corner and found...
14122.title: She goes to the village to look for some more t...

141221.content:
She turned a corner and found Ino walking down the street, all by herself.

'Perfect! As I thought, fate has provided me with another delectable morsel,' Naruko thought to herself as she licked her lips. She decided to make her move and put on her best Naruto impression (not hard, considering she essentially was him).

"Hey Ino! What's up!"

Ino turned around, finally noticing what appeared to be her ninja comrade.

"Oh, hey Naruto!" she replied. "You finish your training already?"

"Sure did! Gotta admit, it was a real liberating experience!"

Ino found the statement a bit odd, but paid it no mind.

"Hmm, whatever. Say, have you seen Sakura? She said she was going to go look for you."

Internally, Naruko was grinning madly, but she maintained her guise.

"Hmm, nope. 'Fraid not."

"Huh, that's odd," Ino said mildly concerned.

"Oh, don't worry. I've got a gut feeling she's around somewhere."

"Eh, I'm sure you're right," Ino said, sincerely reassured.

Naruko decided this would be the best time to make her strike.

"Hey Ino, about my training, I actually came up with this really cool jutsu I want to show you."

"Oh? What is it?" Ino asked, a bit intrigued.

"Hang on. To do it, I have to be in a small confined space. Let's go down that alley over there."

Ino thought it was a bit peculiar, but she saw no harm in it. "Well, okay, if you say so."

They made their way into the alley; remote and secluded. Not a soul would see them. 'The alley. The perfect web for the spider to snare her prey,' Naruko contemplated to herself. The two stopped about midway through.

"All right, now what's this jutsu?" Ino asked.

"Just stand right up against the wall there," Naruko instructed.

She complied. Naruko then made a hand sign and puff of smoke appeared around her. She had reverted to her true feminine self.

"Oh for Pete's sake. You're stupid Sexy Jutsu again?" Ino groaned. "I can't believe I fell for this."

Naruko chuckled. "Well, actually, Ino, this isn't the Sexy Jutsu. This is the real me."

Ino was quite puzzled by her statement.

"Wha....what are you talking about?"

Naruko grinned and then lunged at Ino. She grabbed both her arms and, using her newly-gained Chakra Enhanced Strength, pinned her to the wall.

"What are you... get off!" Ino struggled, but could do nothing against the far superior strength of her attacker.

"You see Ino, I haven't been totally honest with you," said Naruko. "As you may have guessed, I'm not really Naruto."

"Wh-who are you?" Ino asked desperately

"Well, I suppose you could say I'm a part of Naruto. His 'feminine side' perhaps. But you can call me Naruko. Not that it really matters, because soon you'll be more well-acquainted with me than you'd ever hoped."

This wasn't making any sense to Ino, but she knew she had to get away from this girl, however futile her efforts may have been.

"You see, I also lied about not knowing where Sakura is. I know exactly where she is, and she's right here."

Suddenly, her stomach ballooned out, returning to the same bloated size as before. Ino was completely stunned by what she was seeing.

"See? She's resting comfortably in my warm belly. And I have her to thank for this Chakra Enhanced Strength that I'm using to restrain you. Now, as for the jutsu I wanted to show you, well... I think you already know where this is going."

Ino desperately didn't want to believe that what she was implying was true, but all evidence seemed to indicate that this girl had consumed her friend and was planning to do the same to her.

"No... You... You can't!" Ino cried"

"Oh, I most certainly can!" she rebutted. "C'mon, don't you want to be with your friend?" she taunted, pressing her belly up against Ino. "It would be a terrible thing to keep such close friends separated from each other. Just part of my generous nature."

"W-why are you doing this?" Ino asked pitifully.

"Why? Because I'm hungry of course. And if there's one thing Naruto and I have in common, it's that we have good taste in women. Now come on, be a good girl and let me swallow you whole!"

Ino had ceased struggling. She was completely paralyzed with fear.

"Consumption Jutsu!" Naruko yelled. Her wide mouth came down on Ino, sealing her fate.

"N-No!" was the last thing Ino managed to squeak out before she was engulfed in darkness.

Naruko's expansive maw clamped down over Ino's head. She wasted no time in guzzling the blond-haired girl down to her gluttonous belly. In almost an instant, she had reached Ino's waist and her head was entering Naruko's stomach. Once she reached Ino's hips, she tilted her head and allowed gravity to send the rest of the girl down her gullet. In a matter of moments, Naruko took the final gulp, sending down Ino's feet, and with that, the girl became nothing more than an addition to Naruko's already humongous waistline. Indeed, with Ino in her belly, Naruko's girth had practically doubled; her stomach now the size of a beach ball.

Naruko chuckled and rubbed her newly-expanded belly.

"See? *hic* Aren't you happy to be with your...*burp* friend now, Ino? And I'm sure you're quite glad to finally have some...*belch* company, Sakura. In fact, I think you may be getting even more soon."

A small gurgle emitted from Naruko's stomach, indicating that, amazingly, despite having swallowed two teenage girls whole, she still wasn't quite full.

"Yes, I think I have room for one more."

"Hey you!"

The female voice was probably the most unnerving thing Naruko had heard since coming into being. It was the thing that had perhaps signified her greatest fear: someone had seen her. She turned around and saw...
141221.title: Ino

1412212.content:
She turned around and saw Tenten. On instinct, Naruko quickly hid behind a trash can, hoping that she hadn't been seen.

"Hello? Who's over there?" yelled Tenten.

Perfect! She hadn't seen her. The dark alley had provided enough cover for Naruko so that Tenten couldn't make out who she was. Thinking quickly, Naruko immediately transformed into Ino, setting a trap for the interloper.

"Tenten? It's me Ino!" Naruko yelled.

"Oh, Ino. What are you doing here?"

"Actually, I'm having a little trouble with something. Can you help me out?"

"Sure thing."

She began walking down the alley and soon found the girl she believed to be Ino.

"So, what's up?" Tenten asked.

"The thing is, Tenten... I'm really hungry."

"Oh, well, we can go the ramen shop, if you'd like." she offered.

"Nah. You'll do just fine." said Naruko.

"Wh... What?!" said Tenten, quite taken aback.

Naruko chuckled.

"I said... *hurk*...*ulp*..."

Naruko suddenly felt a lump coming up her throat, much like what happened after she ate Sakura. She let out a huge belch and, sure enough, Ino's saliva-soaked headband flew out of her mouth and onto the pavement.

"Ugh. I gotta stop doing that," Naruko remarked.

Tenten was in total shock.

"Wh... What the... Who the hell are you?!"

Naruko smiled cattily.

"Well, if you really want to know..."

She released the transformation jutsu, revealing her true self as well as her huge stomach, still swollen with Sakura and Ino.

Tenten stood stunned with fear.

"What the hell is going..."

Suddenly, Naruko held up her hands to perform Ino's signature Mind Transfer Jutsu. Tenten, too overwhelmed to notice, immediately lost consciousness, and Naruko's own consciousness was transferred into her body.

Naruko's limp body fell to the ground, leaning against the building. Tenten's body stood motionless for a moment, but Naruko soon adjusted to her new body and surroundings and was now in total control of Tenten's body.

"Ah, excellent," she said. "I always did want to try the Mind Transfer Jutsu out!"

Suddenly, a voice went off in her head.

"Hey! What's going on?!"

Naruko recognized it as Tenten. She was mildly surprised that Tenten's will had been strong enough to invade her consciousness, but she saw it as an opportunity to taunt her prey some more. She grinned, then stood motionless, focused, and, in her mind, confronted Tenten.

---

Tenten's world had totally shifted. She was no longer in the physical realm, but the dark intangible world of her own subconscious. She looked around, trying to make sense of it all.

"What's going on? Is this all a dream?"

"Oh, I'm afraid it's no dream, sweetie."

Tenten quickly turned, looking for the source of the voice. She soon found Naruko, staring right at her.

"You! Who the hell are you?! Where are we?!"

"Well, to put it simply, I'm Naruto's feminine side come to life through his clone jutsu. And I'm also a lot stronger than him. As for where we are, well... I took over your body using the Yamanaka girl's Mind Transfer Jutsu, so this is a world created by our subconscious that we're communicating through."

"The... The Mind Transfer Jutsu, but... How could you know that?" Tenten asked.

Naruko chuckled deviously.

"Surely you remember that bulbous belly of mine?" said Naruko. "You know, before you were knocked out?"

Tenten did remember it, but the sight seemed so surreal, she didn't see how it could possibly be true.

"Well, I have our dear friend Ino to thank, not only for filling my hungry belly, but for providing me with such a wonderful little jutsu. Oh, and of course my own Consumption jutsu for making it all possible."

Tenten was horrified. "N-no way. You... You ate Ino?!"

"Mmm, and Sakura too. Mighty tasty they were." She made a show by licking her lips. "And you, dear Tenten, are next on the menu."

"N... No! You can't!"

"Oh, but I can..."

Just then, Naruko's body (or the mental manifestation of her body) began to grow exponentially, right before Tenten's eyes. Her expansion soon stopped, and next to Tenten she was a giantess.

"....and I will," she finished.

Tenten was quite frightened by the whole experience, but she tried to compose herself.

"But I don't understand. Why did you take over my body?"

"Ha ha, well, just my perverse nature I guess. You see, I'm going to feed your body into my own."

"That... That's insane!" Tenten cried.

"I dunno, I think it's kinda kinky," Naruko replied nonchalantly.

"But how? Doesn't your body have to activate the Consumption jutsu?"

"Ah, that's the best part," she said. "When you found me in the alley, I had just finished gobbling up Ino and so I had just activated the Consumption Jutsu. And the Consumption jutsu remains active for 5 minutes, regardless of what happens to the body. Which will give me just enough time to feed that cute little body of yours into my big sexy belly."

Tenten was at a loss as the reality sunk in that soon she was going to become a meal for the depraved giantess standing in front of her. Suddenly, Naruko's giant had reached out and plucked Tenten's comparatively tiny body, lifting her into the air.

"Now, why don't you take a little nap and it will all be over soon."

"No. P-please."

"And don't worry, I'll give you your body back. Once I'm done delivering it to my hungry belly."

She raised the kunoichi further and dangled her over her open mouth.

"No... No!" were the last words Tenten said.

Or, rather the last words she thought as she was dropped into the giant Naruko's mouth and gulped her down, symbolically suppressing her consciousness.

"Well, that takes care of the mind. Now for the body," the giant Naruko said, rubbing her belly.

---

Back in the real world, Naruko was once again conscious in Tenten's body, ready to proceed with her third meal. She observed her own body, lying lifeless in the alleyway.

"Well, this will be quite an experience," She remarked to herself. "I've never fed myself to myself. This really is perverse!" she giggled.

She continued to eye her body. It was the first time she'd ever gotten a truly good look at it.

"Damn. I never realized how sexy I look."

She sincerely believed it, belly and all.
